scripts.sn:demo:m: export HEADLESS=N && export DEBUG=N && export ROLLBACK=Y && npx wdio config/wdio.sn.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@demo'
scripts.sn:debug:m: export HEADLESS=N && export DEBUG=Y && export ROLLBACK=N && npx wdio config/wdio.sn.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@debug'
scripts.sn:smoke:m: export HEADLESS=Y && export DEBUG=N && export ROLLBACK=Y && npx wdio config/wdio.sn.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@smoke'
scripts.sn:demo:w: set HEADLESS=N && set DEBUG=N && set ROLLBACK=Y && npx wdio config/wdio.sn.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@demo'
scripts.sn:debug:w: set HEADLESS=N && set DEBUG=Y && set ROLLBACK=N && npx wdio config/wdio.sn.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@debug'
scripts.sn:smoke:w: set HEADLESS=Y && set DEBUG=N && set ROLLBACK=Y && npx wdio config/wdio.sn.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@smoke'
